name: Resident Silent
description:
Resident Silent is an FPS shooter with an emphasis on atmosphere and exploration. You control a man who must escape from a town populated by zombies, the only weapon is a revolver.

Interesting features of the game are: weapon reloading, you can load cartridges into the drum one by one by holding the "R" key. Everything is shrouded in thick fog, and zombies can break around every corner, you will now and then look around. Zombies are everywhere around you and now you see a silhouette coming out of the fog, a monster is moving towards you with a shuffling gait with a hungry animal growl.

Ever since this strange thick fog appeared, strange things have been happening in our small town. Many people went crazy, many became aggressive and could just kill. Many left this place, but many died, but the worst thing is that they then came to life. To save your life, you need to urgently leave this place...
